title: Text Feature Extraction and Evaluation
description: The scikit-learn library provides tools for text feature extraction and evaluation. In this lab, we will use the 20newsgroups dataset to demonstrate how to extract features from text data, build a pipeline, and evaluate the performance of the model using hyperparameter tuning.

meta.title: Scikit-Learn | Text Feature Extraction | Hyperparameter Tuning
meta.description: Learn how to use the scikit-learn library for text feature extraction, build a pipeline, and evaluate model performance with hyperparameter tuning on the 20newsgroups dataset.
meta.keywords: scikit-learn, text feature extraction, 20newsgroups dataset, hyperparameter tuning, machine learning
